definition: by the window (referring to seats on a plane etc)
to lean against or on/to stand by the side of/to come near to/to depend on/to trust/to fuck (vulgar)/traditional military costume drama where the performers wear armor (old)

sentences.english: All the tables by the window have been booked. I hope you will understand.
sentences.chinese: 所有靠窗的台都已被预定了，希望您能谅解。

sentences.english: Mother was in her chair by the window, her body defined by a thin ray of moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈靠窗坐在椅子上，她的身体罩了一层薄薄地月光。

sentences.english: A window seat in a non-smoking area.
sentences.chinese: 在一个非吸烟区的靠窗座位。

sentences.english: I want a seat which is close to window and can let me stretch my legs.
sentences.chinese: 我们想要一个伸脚空间宽阔而且靠窗的座位。

sentences.english: I want a table by the window. We want to enjoy the nigth view of New York.
sentences.chinese: 我要一个靠窗的桌位这样子我们可以欣赏纽约的夜景。

sentences.english: Tommy crawled down from the window-seat and ran to the door.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆从靠窗的坐位上爬了下来跑到门口。

sentences.english: Well, can we take that one by the window?
sentences.chinese: 我可以要靠窗边的那张桌子吗？

sentences.english: There is a wall calendar near the windows.
She rose stiffly, jerkily from the window seat.
sentences.chinese: 她突然很不自然地从靠窗的座位上站了起来，。

sentences.english: Try to get a window seat near the front of the plane when flying.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐飞机时，争取在飞机前舱找一个靠窗的座位。

sentences.english: The Feng that is stood by window thousand sons hear here, can not help sending out one to bellow.
sentences.chinese: 靠窗站立的凤千代子听到这儿，不禁发出一声惨叫。

sentences.english: I'd like a nonsmoking, window seat, please.
sentences.chinese: 请给我来个禁烟区的靠窗座位。

sentences.english: We'd like to have one window seat definitely , in the nonsmoking section .
sentences.chinese: 我们一定要一个靠窗的座位，在不抽烟区。

sentences.english: A moment later they were seated next to the window.
sentences.chinese: 片刻之后，他们已经坐到了靠窗的座位上。

sentences.english: I calmly unrolled my mat in my favorite spot, back right corner by the window.
sentences.chinese: 我静静的在我最喜欢的右后侧靠窗的角落打开坐垫。

sentences.english: Ms. Booker: OK. I have several seats available. Would you like a window seat or an aisle seat?
sentences.chinese: 好的，我有几张票。你要靠窗户的还是过道的？
